lead_paragraph: After leaving court and climbing into a taxi last week, the pair and their driver vanished, alarming Kenya’s human rights community and roping in Western embassies.

headline.print_headline: 3 Kenyan Men Vanish After Police Complaint
headline.main: Kenyan Filed a Complaint Against the Police, Then He and His Lawyer Disappeared

snippet: After leaving court and climbing into a taxi last week, the pair and their driver vanished, alarming Kenya’s human rights community and roping in Western embassies.
abstract: Disappearance of Josephat Mwenda, his lawyer Williw Kimani and taxi driver they used in Nairobi has set off alarm bells in Kenya's human rights community; Mwenda had filed criminal complaint against unnamed police officer who allegedly accidentally shot him in arm, and was then subjected to intimidation by police; many fear three men have been killed.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
